response.overview: Two drug convicts serving prison sentences are vying to be Thailand's first female boxers to garner a professional World Boxing Title. 23-year-old Siriporn - aka Black Rose - is fighting from behind bars for a pardon on her ten year prison sentence. 29-year-old Nongmai - aka Ring Genius - has just been released from prison and is fighting for freedom from social bars: poverty, inequality and discrimination. Trace the duo's path as they fight their way, round after round, to gain redemption and recognition.
response.title: Boxing Behind Bars
